title.rendered: NEWTECONS HOLDS A CEREMONY TO DEFENSE THE PRODUCTION AND BUSINESS PLAN 2020

content.rendered:
(HCM – January 16th, 2020) The defence ceremony of the Production and Business Plan 2020 ended successfully. The program was attended by the Executive Evaluation Council, the Board of Directors and all Project Directors, Managers of Departments and Construction Sites.

In 2019, Newtecons was evaluated to have new and strong developments. Indicators of revenue and profit show that Newtecons is getting better results than other companies in the construction market.

In 2020, the journey of “Endless Innovation” will be more challenging. However, with the youth and enthusiasm of the Board of Directors and the entire staff of the Company, 2020 of the Newtecons will continue to prosper and develop.
